settings.title: how does subscription work?
settings.text_1: Sign up to our subscription service for 15% discount
settings.text_2: Choose the frequency and amount of your subscription
settings.text_3: Pause or cancel your subscription at any time

settings.title: snack subscription box
settings.text: Subscribe and save 15%. Simply set your order frequency and we will ship nomz directly to your doorstep. Need a healthy snack option? Want to try something new and delicious? Just fancy having an emergency stash of something sweet and guilt-free? You're in the right place.

settings.title: subscription benefits
settings.benefit_2: No strings attached – pause or cancel subscription anytime
settings.benefit_4: You can skip or change your next order date
settings.benefit_5: Save 10% and have nomz shipped to your door automatically so you're never hangry

settings.title: taste·monials
settings.testimonial_1: Nomz were excellent in every way...the flavors (hazelnut is my favorite!). the ingredients spot on. the name is perfect. the packaging is clean, simple and elegant.
settings.testimonial_2: Amazing taste and texture.These little bites are amazing!! The texture is so rich and the taste is heavenly!! My favorite snack by far!
settings.testimonial_3: Best snack ever. I absolutely love Nomz. The quality is unbeatable, they are delicious, full of flavor, easy to pack and perfect nutritionally. Thank you.
settings.testimonial_4: I absolutely love these things!!! I don’t know how many months I have been ordering them but they are a staple in my every day diet!! Oh and don’t just stick to one flavour....try all 4.
settings.testimonial_5: Delicious, clean eating and I appreciate the 96 pack for the bulk discount. I love all the flavours and the online shopping/shipping was seamless. Highly recommend - they are SO good.
settings.testimonial_6: Nomz in the only treat in the market, natural and organic, with a very low sugar content. It has helped me replace refined sugar and serves as a daily dessert. I order a box monthly. Cant live without it! Thank you Nomz!
settings.testimonial_7: Soft and seriously delicious! Packed with nutritious ingredients. Best part is they only have a few ingredients!
settings.testimonial_8: This is just amazing! So healthy and filling! I am addicted to it. It is the best snack out there and it tastes heavenly; I tried various brands of energy balls and this is one is the best.
settings.testimonial_9: These magical healthy bites taste like chocolate truffles! I am obsessed with them and have gotten my family hooked. As someone with celiac these are a great sweet treat with no worry or guilt. Pistachio bites are my favourite!
